title: Zz'Rot Portal minions attacking Zac's Passive blobs
body:
Zz'Rot minions consider Zac's blobs to be valid targets and are not considering the blobs as a champion.
as these minions can have upwards of 400 AD this can be very dangerous for Zac and does not seem to be 
an intended use for the item. Zac's Passive blobs need to be classified as a champion to prevent these
unintended damage

replies.body: Do you mean they attack the blobs like they would another minion or they attack the blobs like they would any champion?
